title: Behind The Idea #74: Looking For 3M's Growth With Michael Boyd
description: We return to discussing 3M Company (3M) with Michael Boyd, Seeking Alpha author and owner of Industrial Insights on the Seeking Alpha Marketplace. He was bearish about the company as of April, so we wanted to get his take on what led the company to this point, how they could change his mind, and what he is watching for going forward.
itunes:title: Looking For 3M's Growth With Michael Boyd
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We return to 3M with Michael Boyd to understand how bad things are, and how they might get better.
